Table.SCRIPT: A new headband lets you [{control}] your dreams. Users put the headband on when they go to sleep. They wear it the [{whole}] night. The headband [{senses}] body movement, body [{temperature}], and brain waves. When REM sleep starts, the headband goes into action. It plays low-volume sounds as [{signals}], which tell the user that they are dreaming. Now that person can control what they dream. They can [{play}] piano or turn themselves into a [{superhero}]. Developers are still working on the headbands abilities.
Table.TITLE: Control Your Dreams
